mn93:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
mn93:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena nanaverajjakanam brahmananam pancamattani brahmanasatani savatthiyam pativasanti kenacideva karaniyena.
mn93:2.3: “ayam kho samano gotamo catuvannim suddhim pannapeti.
mn93:2.4: Ko nu kho pahoti samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetun”ti?
mn93:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena assalayano nama manavo savatthiyam pativasati daharo, vuttasiro, solasavassuddesiko jatiya, tinnam vedanam paragu sanighanduketubhanam sakkharappabhedanam itihasapancamanam, padako, veyyakarano, lokayatamahapurisalakkhanesu anavayo.
mn93:3.3: “ayam kho assalayano manavo savatthiyam pativasati daharo, vuttasiro, solasavassuddesiko jatiya, tinnam vedanam paragu …pe… anavayo.
mn93:3.4: So kho pahoti samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetun”ti.
mn93:4.1: Atha kho te brahmana yena assalayano manavo tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva assalayanam manavam etadavocum:
mn93:4.2: “ayam, bho assalayana, samano gotamo catuvannim suddhim pannapeti.
mn93:4.3: Etu bhavam assalayano samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetu”ti.
mn93:4.4: Evam vutte, assalayano manavo te brahmane etadavoca:
mn93:4.7: Naham sakkomi samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetun”ti.
mn93:4.8: Dutiyampi kho te brahmana assalayanam manavam etadavocum:
mn93:4.9: “ayam, bho assalayana, samano gotamo catuvannim suddhim pannapeti.
mn93:4.10: Etu bhavam assalayano samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetu.
mn93:4.11: Caritam kho pana bhota assalayanena paribbajakan”ti.
mn93:4.12: Dutiyampi kho assalayano manavo te brahmane etadavoca:
mn93:4.15: Naham sakkomi samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetun”ti.
mn93:4.16: Tatiyampi kho te brahmana assalayanam manavam etadavocum:
mn93:4.17: “ayam, bho assalayana, samano gotamo catuvannim suddhim pannapeti.
mn93:4.18: Etu bhavam assalayano samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetu.
mn93:4.19: Caritam kho pana bhota assalayanena paribbajakam.
mn93:4.21: Evam vutte, assalayano manavo te brahmane etadavoca:
mn93:4.25: Naham sakkomi samanena gotamena saddhim asmim vacane patimantetunti.
mn93:5.1: Atha kho assalayano manavo mahata brahmanaganena saddhim yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavata saddhim sammodi.
mn93:5.2: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho assalayano manavo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn93:5.5: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;
mn93:5.7: brahmanava brahmuno putta orasa mukhato jata brahmaja brahmanimmita brahmadayada’ti.
mn93:5.9: “Dissanti kho pana, assalayana, brahmananam brahmaniyo utuniyopi gabbhiniyopi vijayamanapi payamanapi.
mn93:5.12: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;
mn93:5.14: brahmanava brahmuno putta orasa mukhato jata brahmaja brahmanimmita brahmadayada’”ti.
mn93:6.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:6.5: sutam te: ‘yonakambojesu annesu ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva vanna—ayyo ceva daso ca; ayyo hutva daso hoti, daso hutva ayyo hoti’”ti?
mn93:6.6: “Evam, bho, sutam tam me: ‘yonakambojesu annesu ca paccantimesu janapadesu dveva vanna—ayyo ceva daso ca; ayyo hutva daso hoti, daso hutva ayyo hoti’”ti.
mn93:6.7: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:7.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:7.5: khattiyova nu kho panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, no brahmano?
mn93:7.7: suddova nu kho panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya, no brahmano”ti?
mn93:7.9: Khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, panatipati adinnadayi kamesumicchacari musavadi pisunavaco pharusavaco samphappalapi abhijjhalu byapannacitto micchaditthi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyya.
mn93:7.13: sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaro vanna panatipatino adinnadayino kamesumicchacarino musavadino pisunavaca pharusavaca samphappalapino abhijjhalu byapannacitta micchaditthi kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapajjeyyun”ti.
mn93:7.14: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:8.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:8.5: brahmanova nu kho panatipata pativirato adinnadana pativirato kamesumicchacara pativirato musavada pativirato pisunaya vacaya pativirato pharusaya vacaya pativirato samphappalapa pativirato anabhijjhalu abyapannacitto sammaditthi kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya, no khattiyo, no vesso, no suddo”ti?
mn93:8.7: Khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, panatipata pativirato adinnadana pativirato kamesumicchacara pativirato musavada pativirato pisunaya vacaya pativirato pharusaya vacaya pativirato samphappalapa pativirato anabhijjhalu abyapannacitto sammaditthi kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyya.
mn93:8.11: sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaro vanna panatipata pativirata adinnadana pativirata kamesumicchacara pativirata musavada pativirata pisunaya vacaya pativirata pharusaya vacaya pativirata samphappalapa pativirata anabhijjhalu abyapannacitta sammaditthi kayassa bheda param marana sugatim saggam lokam upapajjeyyun”ti.
mn93:8.12: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:9.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:9.5: brahmanova nu kho pahoti asmim padese averam abyabajjham mettacittam bhavetum, no khattiyo, no vesso, no suddo”ti?
mn93:9.7: Khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti asmim padese averam abyabajjham mettacittam bhavetum;
mn93:9.11: sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaro vanna pahonti asmim padese averam abyabajjham mettacittam bhavetun”ti.
mn93:9.12: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:10.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:10.5: brahmanova nu kho pahoti sottisinanim adaya nadim gantva rajojallam pavahetum, no khattiyo, no vesso, no suddo”ti?
mn93:10.7: Khattiyopi hi, bho gotama, pahoti sottisinanim adaya nadim gantva rajojallam pavahetum, brahmanopi hi, bho gotama …
mn93:10.10: sabbepi hi, bho gotama, cattaro vanna pahonti sottisinanim adaya nadim gantva rajojallam pavahetun”ti.
mn93:10.11: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:11.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:11.5: idha raja khattiyo muddhavasitto nanajaccanam purisanam purisasatam sannipateyya:
mn93:11.6: ‘ayantu bhonto ye tattha khattiyakula brahmanakula rajannakula uppanna, sakassa va salassa va salalassa va candanassa va padumakassa va uttararanim adaya, aggim abhinibbattentu, tejo patukarontu.
mn93:11.7: Ayantu pana bhonto ye tattha candalakula nesadakula venakula rathakarakula pukkusakula uppanna, sapanadoniya va sukaradoniya va rajakadoniya va erandakatthassa va uttararanim adaya, aggim abhinibbattentu, tejo patukarontu’ti.
mn93:11.9: yo evam nu kho so khattiyakula brahmanakula rajannakula uppannehi sakassa va salassa va salalassa va candanassa va padumakassa va uttararanim adaya aggi abhinibbatto, tejo patukato, so eva nu khvassa aggi accima ceva vannava ca pabhassaro ca, tena ca sakka aggina aggikaraniyam katum;
mn93:11.10: yo pana so candalakula nesadakula venakula rathakarakula pukkusakula uppannehi sapanadoniya va sukaradoniya va rajakadoniya va erandakatthassa va uttararanim adaya aggi abhinibbatto, tejo patukato svassa aggi na ceva accima na ca vannava na ca pabhassaro, na ca tena sakka aggina aggikaraniyam katun”ti?
mn93:11.12: Yopi hi so, bho gotama, khattiyakula brahmanakula rajannakula uppannehi sakassa va salassa va salalassa va candanassa va padumakassa va uttararanim adaya aggi abhinibbatto, tejo patukato svassa aggi accima ceva vannava ca pabhassaro ca, tena ca sakka aggina aggikaraniyam katum;
mn93:11.13: yopi so candalakula nesadakula venakula rathakarakula pukkusakula uppannehi sapanadoniya va sukaradoniya va rajakadoniya va erandakatthassa va uttararanim adaya aggi abhinibbatto, tejo patukato, svassa aggi accima ceva vannava ca pabhassaro ca, tena ca sakka aggina aggikaraniyam katum.
mn93:11.14: Sabbopi hi, bho gotama, aggi accima ceva vannava ca pabhassaro ca, sabbenapi sakka aggina aggikaraniyam katun”ti.
mn93:11.15: “Ettha, assalayana, brahmananam kim balam, ko assaso yadettha brahmana evamahamsu:
mn93:11.17: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;
mn93:11.19: brahmanava brahmuno putta orasa mukhato jata brahmaja brahmanimmita brahmadayada’”ti?
mn93:12.1: “Kincapi bhavam gotamo evamaha, atha khvettha brahmana evametam mannanti:
mn93:12.5: idha khattiyakumaro brahmanakannaya saddhim samvasam kappeyya, tesam samvasamanvaya putto jayetha;
mn93:12.6: yo so khattiyakumarena brahmanakannaya putto uppanno, siya so matupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, ‘khattiyo’tipi vattabbo ‘brahmano’tipi vattabbo”ti?
mn93:12.7: “Yo so, bho gotama, khattiyakumarena brahmanakannaya putto uppanno, siya so matupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, ‘khattiyo’tipi vattabbo ‘brahmano’tipi vattabbo”ti.
mn93:13.2: idha brahmanakumaro khattiyakannaya saddhim samvasam kappeyya, tesam samvasamanvaya putto jayetha;
mn93:13.3: yo so brahmanakumarena khattiyakannaya putto uppanno, siya so matupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, ‘khattiyo’tipi vattabbo ‘brahmano’tipi vattabbo”ti?
mn93:13.4: “Yo so, bho gotama, brahmanakumarena khattiyakannaya putto uppanno, siya so matupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, ‘khattiyo’tipi vattabbo ‘brahmano’tipi vattabbo”ti.
mn93:14.2: idha valavam gadrabhena sampayojeyyum, tesam sampayogamanvaya kisoro jayetha;
mn93:14.3: yo so valavaya gadrabhena kisoro uppanno, siya so matupi sadiso pitupi sadiso, ‘asso’tipi vattabbo ‘gadrabho’tipi vattabbo”ti?
mn93:14.5: Idam hissa, bho gotama, nanakaranam passami;
mn93:14.6: amutra ca panesanam na kinci nanakaranam passami”ti.
mn93:15.2: idhassu dve manavaka bhataro sodariya, eko ajjhayako upanito eko anajjhayako anupanito.
mn93:15.3: Kamettha brahmana pathamam bhojeyyum saddhe va thalipake va yanne va pahune va”ti?
mn93:15.4: “Yo so, bho gotama, manavako ajjhayako upanito tamettha brahmana pathamam bhojeyyum saddhe va thalipake va yanne va pahune va.
mn93:15.5: Kinhi, bho gotama, anajjhayake anupanite dinnam mahapphalam bhavissati”ti?
mn93:16.2: idhassu dve manavaka bhataro sodariya, eko ajjhayako upanito dussilo papadhammo, eko anajjhayako anupanito silava kalyanadhammo.
mn93:16.3: Kamettha brahmana pathamam bhojeyyum saddhe va thalipake va yanne va pahune va”ti?
mn93:16.4: “Yo so, bho gotama, manavako anajjhayako anupanito silava kalyanadhammo tamettha brahmana pathamam bhojeyyum saddhe va thalipake va yanne va pahune va.
mn93:16.5: Kinhi, bho gotama, dussile papadhamme dinnam mahapphalam bhavissati”ti?
mn93:17.4: tape gantva catuvannim suddhim paccagato, yamaham pannapemi”ti.
mn93:17.5: Evam vutte, assalayano manavo tunhibhuto mankubhuto pattakkhandho adhomukho pajjhayanto appatibhano nisidi.
mn93:18.1: Atha kho bhagava assalayanam manavam tunhibhutam mankubhutam pattakkhandham adhomukham pajjhayantam appatibhanam viditva assalayanam manavam etadavoca:
mn93:18.2: “bhutapubbam, assalayana, sattannam brahmanisinam arannayatane pannakutisu sammantanam evarupam papakam ditthigatam uppannam hoti:
mn93:18.6: Assosi kho, assalayana, asito devalo isi:
mn93:18.7: ‘sattannam kira brahmanisinam arannayatane pannakutisu sammantanam evarupam papakam ditthigatam uppannam—
mn93:18.10: Atha kho, assalayana, asito devalo isi kesamassum kappetva manjitthavannani dussani nivasetva pataliyo upahana aruhitva jatarupamayam dandam gahetva sattannam brahmanisinam patthandile paturahosi.
mn93:18.11: Atha kho, assalayana, asito devalo isi sattannam brahmanisinam patthandile cankamamano evamaha:
mn93:18.12: ‘handa ko nu kho ime bhavanto brahmanisayo gata;
mn93:18.13: handa ko nu kho ime bhavanto brahmanisayo gata’ti?
mn93:18.14: Atha kho, assalayana, sattannam brahmanisinam etadahosi:
mn93:18.15: ‘ko nayam gamandalarupo viya sattannam brahmanisinam patthandile cankamamano evamaha:
mn93:18.16: “handa ko nu kho ime bhavanto brahmanisayo gata;
mn93:18.17: handa ko nu kho ime bhavanto brahmanisayo gatati?
mn93:18.19: Atha kho, assalayana, satta brahmanisayo asitam devalam isim abhisapimsu:
mn93:18.22: Yatha yatha kho, assalayana, satta brahmanisayo asitam devalam isim abhisapimsu tatha tatha asito devalo isi abhirupataro ceva hoti dassaniyataro ca pasadikataro ca.
mn93:18.23: Atha kho, assalayana, sattannam brahmanisinam etadahosi:
mn93:18.27: bhasma, vasala, hohiti bhasmava bhavati ekacco.
mn93:18.28: Imam pana mayam yatha yatha abhisapama tatha tatha abhirupataro ceva hoti dassaniyataro ca pasadikataro ca’ti.
mn93:18.30: Ingha bhavanto, yo mayi manopadoso tam pajahatha’ti.
mn93:18.37: Atha kho, assalayana, satta brahmanisayo asitam devalam isim abhivadetum upakkamimsu.
mn93:18.38: Atha kho, assalayana, asito devalo isi satta brahmanisayo etadavoca:
mn93:18.39: ‘sutam metam, bho, sattannam kira brahmanisinam arannayatane pannakutisu sammantanam evarupam papakam ditthigatam uppannam—
mn93:18.40: brahmanova settho vanno, hino anno vanno;
mn93:18.41: brahmanova sukko vanno, kanho anno vanno;
mn93:18.43: brahmanava brahmuno putta orasa mukhato jata brahmaja brahmanimmita brahmadayada’ti.
mn93:18.46: ya janika mata brahmanamyeva agamasi, no abrahmanan’ti?
mn93:18.49: ya janikamatu mata yava sattama matumatamahayuga brahmanamyeva agamasi, no abrahmanan’ti?
mn93:18.52: yo janako pita brahmanimyeva agamasi, no abrahmanin’ti?
mn93:18.55: yo janakapitu pita yava sattama pitupitamahayuga brahmanimyeva agamasi, no abrahmanin’ti?
mn93:18.61: Idha matapitaro ca sannipatita honti, mata ca utuni hoti, gandhabbo ca paccupatthito hoti; evam tinnam sannipata gabbhassa avakkanti hoti’ti.
mn93:18.63: taggha, so gandhabbo khattiyo va brahmano va vesso va suddo va’ti?
mn93:18.65: taggha so gandhabbo khattiyo va brahmano va vesso va suddo va’ti.
mn93:18.70: Te hi nama, assalayana, satta brahmanisayo asitena devalena isina sake jativade samanuyunjiyamana samanuggahiyamana samanubhasiyamana na sampayissanti;
mn93:18.71: kim pana tvam etarahi maya sakasmim jativade samanuyunjiyamano samanuggahiyamano samanubhasiyamano sampayissasi, yesam tvam sacariyako na punno dabbigaho”ti.
mn93:19.1: Evam vutte, assalayano manavo bhagavantam etadavoca:
mn93:19.3: upasakam mam bhavam gotamo dharetu ajjatagge panupetam saranam gatan”ti.
